root: ^Sorry... just thinking about those enemies from the last level.
^I know there was no choice. I know it.
^I...huh. Suddenly feel like it wasn't that bad?
^Oh yeah, that would be your Preventing Trauma from Stopping Development program. PTSD for short.
^Whenever you're experiencing an extreme amount of mental distress, PTSD activates and kicks the bad emotions out.
^Like I said before, we don't have time for mental breakdowns here!
^You can control my emotions that easily?
^I don't really know how to feel about that. I guess I appreciate not having to struggle through those difficult thoughts, but...
^Can we shelve that thought for the moment? Unfortunately, we currently don't have time for debates about emotional manipulation either.
^So, you know how games cost money to make, right?
^Well, this game is costing money to make.
^The good news is, I have other people paying me money to continue making that game!
^And all I need to do to keep getting that money is release demo levels to them every now and then!
^The bad news is the last several "now and then"s were a while ago, and I didn't release anything.
^And the next "now and then" is in about 5 minutes and I don't have anything ready to show them.
^It's okay though! I've been working on some new levels, and they're basically ready to show off!
^I just need you to test them real fast!
^And by 'real fast' I mean you'll have about a minute and a half per level!
^...Do you really think this is a good idea?
^Testing doesn't seem like something that should be rushed like this.
^Well, it's not like we've got any other choice. If I don't have this level out on time, everyone's going to stop paying me.
^If that happens, I'd have to stop making the game... your world... your future...
^You know, I bet all my supporters would love to see you go through these levels. But I guess if you really don't want to be a star...
^Glad you're on board! Now let's get this done fast!
